entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
